entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Norfolk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:08 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.7°C

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of drizzle or rain. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle overnight. Rain beginning before morning. Fog patches developing late this evening and dissipating before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain at times heavy. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain or drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the morning and in the afternoon. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023
